definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: It was an adaptation of Wilson's cloud chamber, filled with nitrogen gas.

sentences.english: The Atractylone in sample solution was kept stable in nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 样品溶液中的苍术酮经充氮气后保持稳定。

sentences.english: AlN crystals were grown by modified sandwich sublimation method in nitrogen atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 采用改进的升华法在氮气环境下制备氮化铝单晶体。

sentences.english: The microporosity of the wall structure was evaluated by the nitrogen adsorption determination.
sentences.chinese: 对杂化材料孔壁的微孔性通过氮气吸附进行了测定。

sentences.english: It forecasts application prospect of the nitrogen pulse back blow dedusting system.

sentences.english: More than three-fourths of the gas is nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 气体中四分之三的气体都是氮气。

sentences.chinese: 氮气从空气中被去除，使得燃料能够在纯氧中燃烧。

sentences.english: A pressure swing adsorption nitrogen generating device for producing nitro- gen enriched gas from compressed air was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 一种用压缩空气制取氮气的变压吸附制氮设备。

sentences.english: Will you sunder nitrogen from air?
sentences.chinese: 你能从空气中把氮气分离出来吗？

sentences.english: In 1998, aid to drain technology by nitrogen heat-proof is developed.

sentences.english: Nitrogen is not miscible with oil.

sentences.chinese: 厚厚的氮气组成的大气层你弥漫着烟雾和云。
